price: Nguo zao zitakuwa za lami, na Moto utazigubika nyuso zao.
arabic: سَرَابِيلُهُم مِّن قَطِرَانٖ وَتَغۡشَىٰ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ
footnotes: Ngozi zao zimepakwa lami inayo chiririka, imekuwa kama ndio nguo juu ya ngozi zao. Na moto umewapamba na kuwagubika nyuso zao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: sarābīluhum min qaṭirānin wataghshā wujūhahumu al-nāru
